00051 class NEDXML_API CppExpressionGenerator

00053   protected:
00054     typedef std::vector<NEDElement *> NEDElementVector;
00055     struct ExpressionInfo {
00056         ExpressionElement *expr;
00057         int ctxtype; // tagcode of toplevel element which contains this expr.
00058         NEDElement *submoduleTypeDecl; // if submodule or network, the type decl.
00059         std::string name; // generated expression class name (Expr0, Expr1, etc)
00060         NEDElementVector ctorargs;
00061         NEDElementVector cachedvars;
00062     };
00063     typedef std::map<ExpressionElement *,ExpressionInfo> NEDExpressionMap;

00065     static int count;
